title: Amazon, Microsoft, SpiderOak join Defense Innovation Unit’s hybrid space network project
summary: The Defense Innovation Unit on Nov. 2 announced new agreements with Amazon Web Services, Kuiper Government Solutions, Microsoft Azure Space and SpiderOak Mission Systems.

title: Rocket Lab to attempt booster recovery on upcoming Electron launch
summary: Rocket Lab says it will make a second mid-air recovery attempt of an Electron booster during the launch later this week of a Swedish scientific satellite.

title: Orbex to build Scottish launch site
summary: Small launch vehicle developer Orbex announced Nov. 1 it had secured agreements to begin construction of a launch site in northern Scotland for its rocket that will allow a first launch by the end of 2023.

title: Saudi astronauts to fly on Ax-2 mission to ISS
summary: NASA confirmed Nov. 1 that two astronauts from Saudi Arabia will go to the International Space Station on a private mission in the spring of 2023 operated by Axiom Space.

title: The close-up view of two Falcon rockets landing is as majestic as you think
summary: This was the first time SpaceX invited photographers to set up landing zone remotes.
